items.sentence: Tom might be staying with his grandparents in Boston.
I don't think Tom has very many friends in Australia.
I didn't tell Tom that I'd be in Australia this week.
I didn't tell Tom I'd never been to Australia before.
I didn't know Tom had never been to Australia before.
I can't believe I agreed to go to Australia with Tom.
Tom and Mary both came to Boston when they were kids.
I suspect both Tom and Mary have already left Boston.
I think that Tom has decided to study French instead.
I thought that you said you'd never do that with Tom.
